title: Beef meatballs in Japanese curry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '2 tablespoon Japanese soy sauce (tamari)', '1 teaspoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '335g lean minced beef', '1 egg, beaten', '1-2 tablespoons water or as needed', '30g butter', '1 onion, diced', '2 carrots, diced', '4 potatoes, diced', 'hot water, as needed', 'Sauce', '4 blocks Japanese curry concentrate']
